description: Howard is back to satisfy his curiosity for guys. He was a bit nervous, but really eager to get started. That’s where Sean came in…we couldn’t think of a better guy to break Howard in, especially because he was so direct about their plans for the day, “You’re gonna put your dick inside of my butt, I’m gonna like it, you’re gonna like it, and we’re just gonna have a grand ol’ fucking time!” Howard loved the candor, “Oh! I like the sound of that!” Back at the house, Sean jumped right into it by pulling his shorts down and bending over with his ass up for the taking, and Howard took it. They must have had a great time, seeing as they both went at it and came three times each!
title: Howard & Sean: Bareback
